1.title: The Anniversary
1.plot: David and Harmony hit the town to celebrate the 1 year anniversary of his successful project "So Much More." It is hard for David to fully enjoy the evening, as he is reminded of how Delilah helped him get there.

2.title: The Juice
2.plot: After David hits the stage for a performance, the guys go out and party all night. On what should be a celebratory evening, David still seems to be struggling with something internally.

3.title: Love Conquers
3.plot: Harmony and David's relationship is on the rocks and Delilah has come back like she said she would. It's time for David to make a choice.

imdb.plot outline: As a young hip-hop artist in Chicago, David is trying to navigate through the sudden success of his most recent project "So Much More." David's girlfriend, Harmony (Ashley-Lauren Elrod) attempts to keep him grounded, while the perils of fame come alive through the character Delilah, (Eileen Hertz). The question is whether David is running away from or running towards Delilah.
imdb.title: So Much More
plot: As a young hip-hop artist in Chicago, David is trying to navigate through the sudden success of his most recent project "_So Much More_ (qv)." David's girlfriend, Harmony (Ashley-Lauren Elrod) attempts to keep him grounded, while the perils of fame come alive through the character Delilah, (Eileen Hertz). The question is whether David is running away from or running towards Delilah.::David Lopez
